Name: Wat A Life
About the game: Wat a Life is an easy simulation game. In the game, you will play a game maker to taste the ups and downs of life from his point of view. In the game, you can enrich your economy by making games and uploading them, so as to change better configuration and living conditions. You will fight against hunger and temptation and defeat them to fulfill your dreams. If You are a sandbox or simulation type of game enthusiast, this game will certainly meet your needs. game features [/] ·Many interactive props ·Eggs! ·Super real game experience version [/] At present, it is in the alpha stage, but the game content is relatively complete, and only some scenes and modeling are missing, as well as the multiplayer mode.
